name: Clown-chan's Big Societal Adventure
description:
Each level is beaten by throwing the right-coloured ball against the right-coloured Pillars of Society. Use the power of various hoops to colour and redirect the ball! 

Controls:

  • WASD / arrow keys to move
  • E/X/I to pick up and place down
  • F/C/O to throw the ball
  • Left click to change hoops

Made this for NUS GDG carnival game jam.
